name: PIPE-FLO Demo Project File
summary: Learn about .PIPD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The purchased, non-demo version of PIPE-FLO uses .PIPE files for piping system designs.
NOTE: PIPD files are also used by the demo version of Flow of Fluids, a related CAD product developed by Engineered Software.

description: CAD file created by the demo version of PIPE-FLO pipe system design software; saves a schematic of the piping system and incorporates pipelines, pumps, compressors, control valves, and other components; enables designs to be stored by the trial version of the software.
